Given User is logged in with valid credentials # web.steps.LoginSteps.user_logged_in() And User adds "Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt" to the cart # web.steps.CartSteps.user_adds_item(java.lang.String) When User navigates to the cart page # web.steps.CartSteps.user_navigates_to_cart() And User clicks the checkout button # web.steps.CheckoutSteps.user_clicks_checkout() And User enters first name "John", last name "Doe", and postal code "12345" # web.steps.CheckoutSteps.user_enters_checkout_info(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And User clicks the continue button # web.steps.CheckoutSteps.user_clicks_continue() And User clicks the finish button # web.steps.CheckoutSteps.user_clicks_finish() Then User should see the confirmation message "Thank you for your order!" # web.steps.CheckoutSteps.user_sees_confirmation(java.lang.String)
